headline: How Recent Analyst Shifts Are Rewriting The Story For Clorox (CLX)
summary: Cloroxâ€™s latest price target work reflects a slightly more cautious base case, with fair value trimmed from about US$122.41 to US$119.76 as analysts balance mixed views on volume, pricing, and earnings quality. The discount rate and long term revenue growth assumptions are essentially steady, but modestly softer expectations for the top line and earnings power have been enough to nudge the fair value estimate lower rather than higher. If you are following the stock, it is worth staying tuned...
